alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 14 at 6:29PM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Stanley, Jones and Lyman Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
